page.title: 09RAF in Uxbridge Community
page.content: The RAF is responsible for 2,300 servicemen and women,1,800 of them in the U.K,500 overseas such as Russia, U.S.A,New Zealand,Brazil,Kenya,Tokyo, India,Katmandu and the Arabian Gulf. There are 520 personnel in the Borough of Hillingdon and 450 children at Borough schools.Scouts and guides use the parade square for St Georges Day parades and air cadets have summer camps at the base.On the base they also have a Mark 1H Spitfire which was built one year after World War Two finished and so missed the Battle of Britain,but it has been used by the RAF and they are very proud of it.RAF Uxbridge is the headquarters of the Central Band of the Royal Air Force and the School of Music and they frequently entertain the community.
